articles.author: Lucy Needham
articles.title: Grinning Donald Trump poses with Kim Kardashian in Oval Office
articles.description: It's thought the reality star also wanted to ask the US President to pardon Alice Marie Johnson, who has served more than 20 years in prison for a first-time non-violent drug offence

articles.author: Susie Boniface
articles.title: Secret documents reveal servicemen were 'guinea pigs' during nuclear tests
articles.description: Cold War scandal emerges as unearthed files back up story of Eric Denson, who was among RAF officers whose family inherited health defects due to the A-bomb

articles.author: Sophie Evans
articles.title: 'My cheeky little boys fell asleep next to me - but they never woke up'
articles.description: EXCLUSIVE - Vanessa Robinson's little boys Chase, eight, and Tyler, six, died from accidental carbon monoxide poisoning eight years ago today - below, she describes that heartbreaking night

articles.title: Brigitte Nielsen announces she's pregnant at 54 with stunning baby bump reveal
articles.description: The Beverley Hills Cop II actress already has four sons, with the eldest being 34-year-old Julian

articles.author: Lucy Clarke-Billings
articles.title: Man charged with murder of mum, 31, and her daughter, 11, after pair found dead
articles.description: We'll be bringing you the very latest updates, pictures and video on this breaking news story

articles.author: Kelly-Ann Mills
articles.title: Police dog dies after man with axe shouting ‘Allahu Akbar’ attacked officers
articles.description: Police had been called to a disturbance at a house, where the 26-year-old Syrian man lived with his father

articles.author: Christopher Bucktin
articles.title: Roseanne Barr continues string of abusive tweets in fresh online rant
articles.description: After making an apology to Obama's aide for calling her an "ape", she then reposted her initial remarks plus an offensive image and a fake tweet

articles.title: Eagle-eyed royal fans spot unseen photo of Harry and Meghan in Queen's room
articles.description: The image of the newlyweds sits proudly on display in Buckingham Palace's Audience Room, where the Queen greets guests and dignitaries on a weekly basis

articles.title: Florida school gunman reveals his horrifying "goal" in chilling videos

articles.title: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle are returning wedding gifts worth ‘millions'
articles.description: The newly-weds are sending back the gifts used as "publicity stunts" by companies across the world
